<black widow>.name: Black Widow
<black widow>.info: A former Russian spy and master martial artist, Black Widow uses her intelligence, agility, and espionage skills to support the Avengers. Despite lacking superpowers, she plays a crucial leadership and tactical role in the team.

<thor>.name: Thor
<thor>.info: Thor is the Norse God of Thunder, wielding the enchanted hammer Mj√∂lnir, which grants him control over lightning and the ability to fly. As the prince of Asgard, he brings cosmic power and divine strength to the Avengers.

<hulk>.name: Hulk
<hulk>.info: After a gamma radiation accident, scientist Bruce Banner transforms into the Hulk, a giant green being of immense strength and rage. Despite his uncontrollable nature, Hulk is an unstoppable force in battle.

<scarlet witch>.name: Scarlet Witch
<scarlet witch>.info: Gifted with chaos magic and telekinesis, Scarlet Witch can manipulate reality and minds with incredible power. Initially a foe, she becomes one of the most powerful and emotionally complex Avengers.
